SEM Specialist for Germany, Austria & Switzerland (Paid and Organic search, Social media).
PROFILE OF EMPLOYEE:
 Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly target levels for number of customers, overall bookings, marketing spend & contribution margin.
 Effectively coordinate with other team members to manage the acquisition spend budget to maximize  efficiency.
 Analyze mid and long term campaign development and identify past drivers and new opportunities for further growth.
 Coordinate the strategy, creative, messaging and deployment of search listing copy, media and offer mix by keyword.
 Execute and measure Search marketing strategy at the keyword level.
 Play a key role in the cross-functional team effort to optimize the Vistaprint site for Natural organic search listings.
 Utilize  internal and  external resources  to manage spend and campaigns.
 Manage relationship with external search partners and internal Vistaprint team-members to ensure that the Search channels performance is optimized.
SKILLS:
 University degree in Business or Marketing.
 In-depth knowledge and understanding of DACH Search Market.
 Strong analytical and organizational skills.
 Self-motivated and able to work independently.
 Proactive and with a can do attitude.
 Planned and disciplined, detail-oriented and precise.
 Comfortable in competitive, high-performance target driven environment.
 Native German language skills (both written and verbal); strong English language.
 French language skills and or/experience within the Swiss market are a plus.
Benefits: Health and Dental Insurance, life insurance, tickets restaurant, airplane tickets & accommodation for interviews. Full relocation package. SALARY to be discussed.

The Centre for Ecological Research and Forestry Applications (CREAF) is a public research institution that was created in 1987 by the Generalitat (Autonomous Government) of Catalonia, the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB) and the Institute of Catalan Studies (IEC), to promote basic and applied research in terrestrial ecology. The University of Barcelona (UB) subsequently joined in. CREAF seeks a professional in the field of management research projects, especially Europeans. Main functions of the job:
- Promote the participation of researchers in new research projects (search for new funding opportunities)
- Participation in the request of proposals for new projects
- Control and monitoring of the different projects of the center
- Administrative support and management, participating in the supervision of different projects
- Participation in the preparation of justification reports
- Participation and support in the preparation of audits. 
PROFIL OF EMPLOYEE:Degree in Business Administration, Economics or similar. Or alternatively, a Degree in Biology, Environmental Science, Forest Engineering or similar, with possession of Master`s Degree in Administrative Management. Minimum one year experience in tasks related to project management, having knowledge of the different research programs: FP7, INTERREG, EUROSTARS, LIFE,  Required proof of English level (certificate)
High level of Spanish and Catalan.
We assessed the knowledge of other EU languages.

DESCRIPCIÓN DE LAS FUNCIONES Y TAREAS:
Misión del puesto.
Definir e implantar la estrategia en materia de Influencia Política y Soporte Técnico de la Fundación, de acuerdo con las directrices de la Dirección General y del Área de Programas de Plan España, con el fin de conseguir concienciar a la opinión pública española, lideres de opinión e instituciones políticas acerca de la promoción de los derechos de la infancia.

Identificación del puesto y dimensiones.
El puesto queda encuadrado dentro del Área de Programas a cuyo director reporta directamente.

Alcance del puesto.
Relaciones internas: Relación con el resto de áreas de Plan España. Relaciones con otras oficinas de Plan a nivel internacional y con el International Headquarters de Plan.
Relaciones externas: administraciones e instituciones públicas nacionales e internacionales, organizaciones políticas, organismos internacionales, redes sectoriales nacionales e internacionales (GMC, CONGDE, POI, etc.), ONGs, medios de comunicación.
Responsabilidades.
- Definir y ejecutar la estrategia, presupuesto y plan anual de acción en materia de  Influencia Política de Plan España.
- Contribuir dentro del Área de Programas a la definición del discurso de Plan España en materia de derechos de infancia.

- Desarrollar un plan de relaciones institucionales a fin de contribuir al posicionamiento de Plan como organización de referencia en materia de derechos de infancia entre las administraciones públicas, instituciones políticas y organismos internacionales.
- Establecer, junto con la Dirección del Área de Programas, relaciones con organizaciones y coordinadoras de ONG a nivel nacional e internacional, con objeto de representar el discurso de Plan en lo relativo a la defensa de los derechos de la infancia.
- Elaborar y adaptar position papers a nivel internacional de Plan en materia de influencia política y derechos de infancia.
- Coordinación con el International Headquarters y resto de oficinas de Plan Internacional.

As a Consultant, you will work in a project team and support our clients in solving a technology challenge. 

Depending on academic background and practical experience your assignment will involve a variety of project stages: technical/strategic studies, research and development and/or implementation. 
 
During your assignment, you can work in a number of different projects and gather valuable experience in an international context.

 - Your profile

MSc, Diploma (or equivalent) in engineering, specializing in computer science/computer engineering, electrical engineering, automation technology or telecommunications engineering, mechanical engineering or automotive engineering and have initial professional experience in technical projects in the automotive, aerospace or aeronautics industry. In addition, you are familiar with one or more of the following areas:

-development of microcontroller- or DSP-based cross-linked embedded systems (software)
-analysis of requirements and standards
-bus systems (e.g. CAN, LIN, MOST, FlexRay)
-development processes (V-model, SPICE, CMMI)
-programming languages: C/C++, assembler
-compilers & linkers
-operating systems: osek, nucleus (or similar)
-version control: synergy, clearcase, cvs (or similar)

* Mobility:
100 km away from Barcelona

Studies: Upper Electronics, telecommunication or Systems Engineering.
Experience: More than 1 year.
Personal capabilities : Good communication skills and team work.

Requirement: 

- To apply please send us your candidature to andrea.aponte@altran.es
- Notice that to participate in our job offer you must have experience among automotive or railway sector before. 

- On the text of your CV it is compulsory to answer the next questions:

1. Why do you think your profile is appropriate for this job offer?.
2. Describe the main project you have done which has given you enough experience to participate in this job offer and also which technological tools you have used.

CAROTENOID TECHNOLOGIES S.A. (www.carotech.biz) IS A MULTINATIONAL COMPANY ACTIVE IN 60 COUNTRIES SPEZIALISED IN INGREDIENTS FOR THE FOOD, PET FOOD AND FEED INDUSTRIES. THE COMPANY IS CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR A TECHNICAL PRODUCT SPECIALIST IN FEED INGREDIENTS, RESPONSIBLE FOR PRODUCT SUPPORT OF THE SALES FORCE, DISTRIBUTORS AND FINAL CLIENTS. WE OFFER THE OPPORTUNITY TO AN EXCITING CAREER IN A FAST GROWING COMPANY AND A PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT.
FUNCTIONS: assistant to the distributor sales force, product training to IQF sales force, answering product related questions from distributors and final clients, training distributor sales force,joint client visits  with the distributor sales force to final client.Give technical seminars and conferences.
REQUIREMENTS:
Graduate, high level animal nutrition knowledge PhD or veterinary sciences, particularly in poultry and swine. Fluent in English, high level user of Microsoft Office. Careful writter, knowing to combine technical responses with Commercial policies. Strong personality, able to be succesful in stressing environment, not easy to feel frustrated. Able to create trust with the client and within the organisation. Able to work and to take decisions autonomously. Culturally sensitive, willing to travel (50% of the time) Used to work independently with a little supervision. Preferably with 3 years or more experience in commercial function.

column4: Talent Search People is a Consulting Company specialized in the Recruitment & Outsourcing of IT & commercial people & native speakers.    We are looking for German Inside Sales Executives (m/f)    AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY:  The Inside Sales Executive is a key member of the territory sales team with responsibility for generating revenue.  This is a quota carrying role and the successful candidates will be working with outside sales executives for their prospective geography to ensure personal and team targets are met. In addition, this individual will be expected to develop their own leads, opportunities and pipeline in their territories through focussed campaigns in order to meet and exceed their quota.   This is an excellent opportunity to develop a career in a fast growing company that is highly profitable and has a market leading product. You will be working in a team environment learning best practices and territory development.     Main responsibilities:     ¿ Attainment of monthly, quarterly and annual activity and revenue goals for their prospective country.  ¿ Working closely with territory channel partners and outside field reps to ensure maximum revenue generation within a territory.  ¿ Building and maintaining a sufficient pipeline in line with revenue goals.  ¿ Forecasting.  ¿ Maintain current and accurate account and contact information within Sales Force.com  ¿ Management of existing accounts to maximize sales revenue.  ¿ Problem solving with key customers ensuring a satisfactory resolution is achieved.  ¿ Preparation of proposals and sales quotes.           THE PROFILE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:    ¿Qualifications  - Native level of German + a high level of English    ¿Experience  -  Preferably 3+ year¿s sales/lead generation experience and experience of closing deals with senior executives  - Proven track record of achieving and exceeding measurable goals in a phone based sales environment  - Previous experience with Sales Force.com would be an added advantage    ¿Skills  - Strong interpersonal and communication skills.  - Excellent prospecting and closing skills.  - Knowledge of business organizations, buying influences and purchasing processes.  - Ability to develop close working relationships with colleagues and clients.  - Systems management experience-working in the enterprise systems management marketplace (HP, BMC, IBM, Net IQ) as well as knowledge of IT infrastructures (applications, networks and databases) would be a big plus.            WHAT'S ON OFFER:  - Lunch tickets  - Private healthcare insurance  - Permanent contract immediately with 2 months probation period  - Immediate incorporation  - International working environment  - Extensive benefit package    - Salary: 35.000€ gross per year + commisions  - Position with a compensation plan designed for you to succeed and career advancement opportunities.  - Immediate incorporation  - International working environment    YOUR APPLICATION:   If interested please send us your CV in English referring to   "ZAV1-Spanien: "German Inside Sales Executives"   e-mail: cstax@talentsearchpeople.com   or call 0034 93 231 0000 (ask for Charlotte Stax)      ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Anschreiben, Lebenslauf (englisch + ZUSÄTZLICH gerne auch auf deutsch), Zeugnisse

Talent Search People is a recruitment agency based in Spain, with offices in Barcelona and Madrid. We focus on Multilingual Speakers, Commercial, IT & E-Commerce and Finance profiles.    For one of our clients we are searching "Business Development Agents". Our client is a direct sales and marketing agency, which specialises in the IT Industry. They help with contacting and managing suspects, prospects and customers with the objective of developing and growing the business of their clients. The company uses marketing databases, telephone, email or web in order to achieve results that are measurable and profitable.    AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY:  B2B lead generation/commercial agent for the Technology industry, representing clients such as Dell, IBM and Microsoft. Based in the Barcelona office (and might require some travel to their either UK or USA offices). As part of your duties, you will contact large companies and conduct business conversations with business professionals in regards to their technology strategy, and you will report to our clients that will follow up those business opportunities to closure. This job requires exceptional professionalism and top class attitude, since they only represent the best, but also good commercial skills, integrity and desire to be the best.     Your main responsibilities include:  - Working with some of the world's largest software and hardware vendors to identify, qualify, pursue and deliver opportunities to them.  - Contacting and  developing connections with business in order to generate leads for the IT companies  - Understanding the business drivers behind technology and how to apply these concepts to a business problem.  - Interacting with clients and your team.  - Working with the telephone approximately 80% of the time    THE PROFILE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:  - Native German speaker with a high level of English  - Experience in telemarketing or as a sales account manager is an advantage but not a must  - Interested in a commercial career  - Good interpersonal and communication skills  - Motivated and Dynamic  - Professionalism and positivism    WHAT'S ON OFFER:  - Possibilities of training in England  - Specialized training program during the first month  - International environment    YOUR APPLICATION:   If interested please send us your CV in English refering to   "ZAV1-Spanien:Business Development Agents"   spascaline@talentsearchpeople.com  or call 0034 93 231 0000 (ask for Sylvia Pascaline) -  Geforderte Anlagen: Your CV in English, Salary expectations and availability

column4: Wir gehören der ALDI-Nord Gruppe an mit unserem nationalen Firmensitz der spanischen Gesellschaft in Barcelona. Unsere Gesellschaft hat ihren Sitz in Sevilla.    Wir suchen:  Junge Hochschulabsolventen mit Führungsqualitäten (abgeschlossenes Studium), wünschenswert aus dem Bereich Wirtschaft, persönliches Engagement, Arbeits- und Anpassungsfähigkeit, Deutsch- und Spanischkenntnisse sowie uneingeschränkte Mobilität innerhalb unseres Tätigkeitsgebietes im Süden Spaniens.     Aufgabengebiet:  Führungsübernahme einer unserer Regionen, in die das Verkaufsstellennetz von ALDI Supermercados im Süden Spaniens unterteilt ist.    Voraussetzungen:  Geografische Mobilität, enge Verbindung zu Andalusien, Teamgeist, Eigeninitiative, hohe Motivation, hohe Entscheidungsfähigkeit, effizientes Arbeiten, Berufserfahrung in den bereichen Verkauf und Mitarbeiterführung, Deutsch- und Spanischkenntnisse.  Für uns ist die persönliche Bindung des Bewerbers an Andalusien / Extremadura besonders wichtig.    Geboten wird ein unbefristeter Arbeitsvertrag.  Gehalt: 36.000€ Brutto/Jahr.   Unterkunft und Firmenwagen werden gestellt. Übernahme der Vorstellungskosten.    Bitte senden Sie Ihre Bewerbung inkl. Diplomzeugnis und Referenzen in deutscher oder spanischer Sprache per e-mail an: Frau Abig, e-mail: dos-ss@aldi.es    ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Lebenslauf, Zeugnisse

Die acs alpha-group ist ein europaweit agierender Engineering- und Personal-Dienstleistungspartner mit Sitz in Bayern und bundes-/europaweiten Niederlassungen und kontinuierlich auf der Suche nach qualifizierten, erfahrenen Köpfen und Talenten.    Unsere Fachbereiche sind neben Engineering, Tooling und Consulting sowohl die ganzheitliche und hochqualitative Personaldienstleistung für Hilfs-, Fach-, Führungskräfte sowie Freiberufler und Menschen die auf der Suche nach neuen Herausforderungen sind, inklusive der individuellen Kompetenz- und Potential-Analyse.    Für unseren renommierten, in Spanien (Valencia) und im Automotiveumfeld ansässigen Kunden suchen wir in Festanstellung    - PROJEKTEINKÄUFER AUTOMOTIVE INTERIEUR (RFQ) m/w  (Kunststoff / Türverkleidungen, Seiten- und Säulenverkleidungen, Hard & Soft-Trim, Mittelkonsole)    OEM: FORD    mit gelegentlicher Reisebereitschaft für Thailand    Sie passen am besten zu uns wenn Sie sich durch folgende Kompetenzen auszeichnen:    - Sie haben allgemeinen Automotive Engineering-Hintergrund mit Erfahrung in der Steuerung von Beschaffungsvorgängen    - gerne Kenntnisse in der Entwicklung von Interieur-Komponenten, bevorzugt Hard Trim (Kunststoff/Holzdekor, Säulen A/B/C, Türverkleidungen, Seitenverkleidungen)    - sprechen fließend Englisch, Spanisch vorteilhaft und verfügen über Kommunikations-und Präsentationstechniken    - Erfahrung im FORD-Umfeld ist von Vorteil    Wir freuen uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Bewerbung vorzugsweise per e-mail    pohl.m@acs-alpha-group.com    welche wir selbstverständlich vertraulich und diskret behandeln. - Geforderte Anlagen: vollständiger und aussagekräftig detailierter Lebenslauf, Zeugnisse; Führerscheine: Fahrerlaubnis B PKW/Kleinbusse (alt: FS 3): Wünschenswert; Kenntnisse und Fertigkeiten: Beschaffungslogistik; Terminplanung, -überwachung

SEM Specialist for Germany, Austria & Switzerland (Paid and Organic search, Social media).
PROFILE OF EMPLOYEE:
 Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly target levels for number of customers, overall bookings, marketing spend & contribution margin.
 Effectively coordinate with other team members to manage the acquisition spend budget to maximize  efficiency.
 Analyze mid and long term campaign development and identify past drivers and new opportunities for further growth.
 Coordinate the strategy, creative, messaging and deployment of search listing copy, media and offer mix by keyword.
 Execute and measure Search marketing strategy at the keyword level.
 Play a key role in the cross-functional team effort to optimize the Vistaprint site for Natural organic search listings.
 Utilize  internal and  external resources  to manage spend and campaigns.
 Manage relationship with external search partners and internal Vistaprint team-members to ensure that the Search channels performance is optimized.
SKILLS:
 University degree in Business or Marketing.
 In-depth knowledge and understanding of DACH Search Market.
 Strong analytical and organizational skills.
 Self-motivated and able to work independently.
 Proactive and with a can do attitude.
 Planned and disciplined, detail-oriented and precise.
 Comfortable in competitive, high-performance target driven environment.
 Native German language skills (both written and verbal); strong English language.
 French language skills and or/experience within the Swiss market are a plus.
Benefits: Health and Dental Insurance, life insurance, tickets restaurant, airplane tickets & accommodation for interviews. Full relocation package. SALARY to be discussed.

The Centre for Ecological Research and Forestry Applications (CREAF) is a public research institution that was created in 1987 by the Generalitat (Autonomous Government) of Catalonia, the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB) and the Institute of Catalan Studies (IEC), to promote basic and applied research in terrestrial ecology. The University of Barcelona (UB) subsequently joined in. CREAF seeks a professional in the field of management research projects, especially Europeans. Main functions of the job:
- Promote the participation of researchers in new research projects (search for new funding opportunities)
- Participation in the request of proposals for new projects
- Control and monitoring of the different projects of the center
- Administrative support and management, participating in the supervision of different projects
- Participation in the preparation of justification reports
- Participation and support in the preparation of audits. 
PROFIL OF EMPLOYEE:Degree in Business Administration, Economics or similar. Or alternatively, a Degree in Biology, Environmental Science, Forest Engineering or similar, with possession of Master`s Degree in Administrative Management. Minimum one year experience in tasks related to project management, having knowledge of the different research programs: FP7, INTERREG, EUROSTARS, LIFE,  Required proof of English level (certificate)
High level of Spanish and Catalan.
We assessed the knowledge of other EU languages.

DESCRIPCIÓN DE LAS FUNCIONES Y TAREAS:
Misión del puesto.
Definir e implantar la estrategia en materia de Influencia Política y Soporte Técnico de la Fundación, de acuerdo con las directrices de la Dirección General y del Área de Programas de Plan España, con el fin de conseguir concienciar a la opinión pública española, lideres de opinión e instituciones políticas acerca de la promoción de los derechos de la infancia.

Identificación del puesto y dimensiones.
El puesto queda encuadrado dentro del Área de Programas a cuyo director reporta directamente.

Alcance del puesto.
Relaciones internas: Relación con el resto de áreas de Plan España. Relaciones con otras oficinas de Plan a nivel internacional y con el International Headquarters de Plan.
Relaciones externas: administraciones e instituciones públicas nacionales e internacionales, organizaciones políticas, organismos internacionales, redes sectoriales nacionales e internacionales (GMC, CONGDE, POI, etc.), ONGs, medios de comunicación.
Responsabilidades.
- Definir y ejecutar la estrategia, presupuesto y plan anual de acción en materia de  Influencia Política de Plan España.
- Contribuir dentro del Área de Programas a la definición del discurso de Plan España en materia de derechos de infancia.

- Desarrollar un plan de relaciones institucionales a fin de contribuir al posicionamiento de Plan como organización de referencia en materia de derechos de infancia entre las administraciones públicas, instituciones políticas y organismos internacionales.
- Establecer, junto con la Dirección del Área de Programas, relaciones con organizaciones y coordinadoras de ONG a nivel nacional e internacional, con objeto de representar el discurso de Plan en lo relativo a la defensa de los derechos de la infancia.
- Elaborar y adaptar position papers a nivel internacional de Plan en materia de influencia política y derechos de infancia.
- Coordinación con el International Headquarters y resto de oficinas de Plan Internacional.

As a Consultant, you will work in a project team and support our clients in solving a technology challenge. 

Depending on academic background and practical experience your assignment will involve a variety of project stages: technical/strategic studies, research and development and/or implementation. 
 
During your assignment, you can work in a number of different projects and gather valuable experience in an international context.

 - Your profile

MSc, Diploma (or equivalent) in engineering, specializing in computer science/computer engineering, electrical engineering, automation technology or telecommunications engineering, mechanical engineering or automotive engineering and have initial professional experience in technical projects in the automotive, aerospace or aeronautics industry. In addition, you are familiar with one or more of the following areas:

-development of microcontroller- or DSP-based cross-linked embedded systems (software)
-analysis of requirements and standards
-bus systems (e.g. CAN, LIN, MOST, FlexRay)
-development processes (V-model, SPICE, CMMI)
-programming languages: C/C++, assembler
-compilers & linkers
-operating systems: osek, nucleus (or similar)
-version control: synergy, clearcase, cvs (or similar)

* Mobility:
100 km away from Barcelona

Studies: Upper Electronics, telecommunication or Systems Engineering.
Experience: More than 1 year.
Personal capabilities : Good communication skills and team work.

Requirement: 

- To apply please send us your candidature to andrea.aponte@altran.es
- Notice that to participate in our job offer you must have experience among automotive or railway sector before. 

- On the text of your CV it is compulsory to answer the next questions:

1. Why do you think your profile is appropriate for this job offer?.
2. Describe the main project you have done which has given you enough experience to participate in this job offer and also which technological tools you have used.

column4: Talent Search People is a recruitment agency based in Spain, with offices in Barcelona and Madrid. We focus on Multilingual Speakers, Commercial, IT & E-Commerce and Finance profiles.    For one of our clients we are searching "Business Development Agents". Our client is a direct sales and marketing agency, which specialises in the IT Industry. They help with contacting and managing suspects, prospects and customers with the objective of developing and growing the business of their clients. The company uses marketing databases, telephone, email or web in order to achieve results that are measurable and profitable.    AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY:  B2B lead generation/commercial agent for the Technology industry, representing clients such as Dell, IBM and Microsoft. Based in the Barcelona office (and might require some travel to their either UK or USA offices). As part of your duties, you will contact large companies and conduct business conversations with business professionals in regards to their technology strategy, and you will report to our clients that will follow up those business opportunities to closure. This job requires exceptional professionalism and top class attitude, since they only represent the best, but also good commercial skills, integrity and desire to be the best.     Your main responsibilities include:  - Working with some of the world's largest software and hardware vendors to identify, qualify, pursue and deliver opportunities to them.  - Contacting and  developing connections with business in order to generate leads for the IT companies  - Understanding the business drivers behind technology and how to apply these concepts to a business problem.  - Interacting with clients and your team.  - Working with the telephone approximately 80% of the time    THE PROFILE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:  - Native German speaker with a high level of English  - Experience in telemarketing or as a sales account manager is an advantage but not a must  - Interested in a commercial career  - Good interpersonal and communication skills  - Motivated and Dynamic  - Professionalism and positivism    WHAT'S ON OFFER:  - Possibilities of training in England  - Specialized training program during the first month  - International environment    YOUR APPLICATION:   If interested please send us your CV in English refering to   "ZAV1-Spanien:Business Development Agents"   spascaline@talentsearchpeople.com  or call 0034 93 231 0000 (ask for Sylvia Pascaline) -  Geforderte Anlagen: Your CV in English, Salary expectations and availability

column4: Talent Search People is a Consulting Company specialized in the Recruitment & Outsourcing of IT & commercial people & native speakers.    We are looking for German Inside Sales Executives (m/f)    AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY:  The Inside Sales Executive is a key member of the territory sales team with responsibility for generating revenue.  This is a quota carrying role and the successful candidates will be working with outside sales executives for their prospective geography to ensure personal and team targets are met. In addition, this individual will be expected to develop their own leads, opportunities and pipeline in their territories through focussed campaigns in order to meet and exceed their quota.   This is an excellent opportunity to develop a career in a fast growing company that is highly profitable and has a market leading product. You will be working in a team environment learning best practices and territory development.     Main responsibilities:     ¿ Attainment of monthly, quarterly and annual activity and revenue goals for their prospective country.  ¿ Working closely with territory channel partners and outside field reps to ensure maximum revenue generation within a territory.  ¿ Building and maintaining a sufficient pipeline in line with revenue goals.  ¿ Forecasting.  ¿ Maintain current and accurate account and contact information within Sales Force.com  ¿ Management of existing accounts to maximize sales revenue.  ¿ Problem solving with key customers ensuring a satisfactory resolution is achieved.  ¿ Preparation of proposals and sales quotes.           THE PROFILE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:    ¿Qualifications  - Native level of German + a high level of English    ¿Experience  -  Preferably 3+ year¿s sales/lead generation experience and experience of closing deals with senior executives  - Proven track record of achieving and exceeding measurable goals in a phone based sales environment  - Previous experience with Sales Force.com would be an added advantage    ¿Skills  - Strong interpersonal and communication skills.  - Excellent prospecting and closing skills.  - Knowledge of business organizations, buying influences and purchasing processes.  - Ability to develop close working relationships with colleagues and clients.  - Systems management experience-working in the enterprise systems management marketplace (HP, BMC, IBM, Net IQ) as well as knowledge of IT infrastructures (applications, networks and databases) would be a big plus.            WHAT'S ON OFFER:  - Lunch tickets  - Private healthcare insurance  - Permanent contract immediately with 2 months probation period  - Immediate incorporation  - International working environment  - Extensive benefit package    - Salary: 35.000€ gross per year + commisions  - Position with a compensation plan designed for you to succeed and career advancement opportunities.  - Immediate incorporation  - International working environment    YOUR APPLICATION:   If interested please send us your CV in English referring to   "ZAV1-Spanien: "German Inside Sales Executives"   e-mail: cstax@talentsearchpeople.com   or call 0034 93 231 0000 (ask for Charlotte Stax)      ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Anschreiben, Lebenslauf (englisch + ZUSÄTZLICH gerne auch auf deutsch), Zeugnisse

Für uns ist die persönliche Bindung des Bewerbers an Andalusien / Extremadura besonders wichtig.    Geboten wird ein unbefristeter Arbeitsvertrag.  Gehalt: 36.000€ Brutto/Jahr. El puesto queda encuadrado dentro del Área de Programas a cuyo director reporta directamente.

Alcance del puesto.
Relaciones internas: Relación con el resto de áreas de Plan España. Relaciones con otras oficinas de Plan a nivel internacional y con el International Headquarters de Plan.
Relaciones externas: administraciones e instituciones públicas nacionales e internacionales, organizaciones políticas, organismos internacionales, redes sectoriales nacionales e internacionales (GMC, CONGDE, POI, etc.), ONGs, medios de comunicación.
Responsabilidades.
- Definir y ejecutar la estrategia, presupuesto y plan anual de acción en materia de  Influencia Política de Plan España.
- Contribuir dentro del Área de Programas a la definición del discurso de Plan España en materia de derechos de infancia.

- Desarrollar un plan de relaciones institucionales a fin de contribuir al posicionamiento de Plan como organización de referencia en materia de derechos de infancia entre las administraciones públicas, instituciones políticas y organismos internacionales.
- Establecer, junto con la Dirección del Área de Programas, relaciones con organizaciones y coordinadoras de ONG a nivel nacional e internacional, con objeto de representar el discurso de Plan en lo relativo a la defensa de los derechos de la infancia.
- Elaborar y adaptar position papers a nivel internacional de Plan en materia de influencia política y derechos de infancia.
- Coordinación con el International Headquarters y resto de oficinas de Plan Internacional.

DESCRIPCIÓN DE LAS FUNCIONES Y TAREAS:
Misión del puesto.
Definir e implantar la estrategia en materia de Influencia Política y Soporte Técnico de la Fundación, de acuerdo con las directrices de la Dirección General y del Área de Programas de Plan España, con el fin de conseguir concienciar a la opinión pública española, lideres de opinión e instituciones políticas acerca de la promoción de los derechos de la infancia.

Identificación del puesto y dimensiones.
El puesto queda encuadrado dentro del Área de Programas a cuyo director reporta directamente.

Alcance del puesto.
Relaciones internas: Relación con el resto de áreas de Plan España. Relaciones con otras oficinas de Plan a nivel internacional y con el International Headquarters de Plan.
Relaciones externas: administraciones e instituciones públicas nacionales e internacionales, organizaciones políticas, organismos internacionales, redes sectoriales nacionales e internacionales (GMC, CONGDE, POI, etc.), ONGs, medios de comunicación.
Responsabilidades.
- Definir y ejecutar la estrategia, presupuesto y plan anual de acción en materia de  Influencia Política de Plan España.
- Contribuir dentro del Área de Programas a la definición del discurso de Plan España en materia de derechos de infancia.

- Desarrollar un plan de relaciones institucionales a fin de contribuir al posicionamiento de Plan como organización de referencia en materia de derechos de infancia entre las administraciones públicas, instituciones políticas y organismos internacionales.
- Establecer, junto con la Dirección del Área de Programas, relaciones con organizaciones y coordinadoras de ONG a nivel nacional e internacional, con objeto de representar el discurso de Plan en lo relativo a la defensa de los derechos de la infancia.
- Elaborar y adaptar position papers a nivel internacional de Plan en materia de influencia política y derechos de infancia.
- Coordinación con el International Headquarters y resto de oficinas de Plan Internacional.

column4: Talent Search People is a Consulting Company specialized in the Recruitment & Outsourcing of IT & commercial people & native speakers.    We are looking for German Inside Sales Executives (m/f)    AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY:  The Inside Sales Executive is a key member of the territory sales team with responsibility for generating revenue.  This is a quota carrying role and the successful candidates will be working with outside sales executives for their prospective geography to ensure personal and team targets are met. In addition, this individual will be expected to develop their own leads, opportunities and pipeline in their territories through focussed campaigns in order to meet and exceed their quota.   This is an excellent opportunity to develop a career in a fast growing company that is highly profitable and has a market leading product. You will be working in a team environment learning best practices and territory development.     Main responsibilities:     ¿ Attainment of monthly, quarterly and annual activity and revenue goals for their prospective country.  ¿ Working closely with territory channel partners and outside field reps to ensure maximum revenue generation within a territory.  ¿ Building and maintaining a sufficient pipeline in line with revenue goals.  ¿ Forecasting.  ¿ Maintain current and accurate account and contact information within Sales Force.com  ¿ Management of existing accounts to maximize sales revenue.  ¿ Problem solving with key customers ensuring a satisfactory resolution is achieved.  ¿ Preparation of proposals and sales quotes.           THE PROFILE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:    ¿Qualifications  - Native level of German + a high level of English    ¿Experience  -  Preferably 3+ year¿s sales/lead generation experience and experience of closing deals with senior executives  - Proven track record of achieving and exceeding measurable goals in a phone based sales environment  - Previous experience with Sales Force.com would be an added advantage    ¿Skills  - Strong interpersonal and communication skills.  - Excellent prospecting and closing skills.  - Knowledge of business organizations, buying influences and purchasing processes.  - Ability to develop close working relationships with colleagues and clients.  - Systems management experience-working in the enterprise systems management marketplace (HP, BMC, IBM, Net IQ) as well as knowledge of IT infrastructures (applications, networks and databases) would be a big plus.            WHAT'S ON OFFER:  - Lunch tickets  - Private healthcare insurance  - Permanent contract immediately with 2 months probation period  - Immediate incorporation  - International working environment  - Extensive benefit package    - Salary: 35.000€ gross per year + commisions  - Position with a compensation plan designed for you to succeed and career advancement opportunities.  - Immediate incorporation  - International working environment    YOUR APPLICATION:   If interested please send us your CV in English referring to   "ZAV1-Spanien: "German Inside Sales Executives"   e-mail: cstax@talentsearchpeople.com   or call 0034 93 231 0000 (ask for Charlotte Stax)      ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Anschreiben, Lebenslauf (englisch + ZUSÄTZLICH gerne auch auf deutsch), Zeugnisse

column4: Talent Search People is a recruitment agency based in Spain, with offices in Barcelona and Madrid. We focus on Multilingual Speakers, Commercial, IT & E-Commerce and Finance profiles.    For one of our clients we are searching "Business Development Agents". Our client is a direct sales and marketing agency, which specialises in the IT Industry. They help with contacting and managing suspects, prospects and customers with the objective of developing and growing the business of their clients. The company uses marketing databases, telephone, email or web in order to achieve results that are measurable and profitable.    AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY:  B2B lead generation/commercial agent for the Technology industry, representing clients such as Dell, IBM and Microsoft. Based in the Barcelona office (and might require some travel to their either UK or USA offices). As part of your duties, you will contact large companies and conduct business conversations with business professionals in regards to their technology strategy, and you will report to our clients that will follow up those business opportunities to closure. This job requires exceptional professionalism and top class attitude, since they only represent the best, but also good commercial skills, integrity and desire to be the best.     Your main responsibilities include:  - Working with some of the world's largest software and hardware vendors to identify, qualify, pursue and deliver opportunities to them.  - Contacting and  developing connections with business in order to generate leads for the IT companies  - Understanding the business drivers behind technology and how to apply these concepts to a business problem.  - Interacting with clients and your team.  - Working with the telephone approximately 80% of the time    THE PROFILE WE ARE LOOKING FOR:  - Native German speaker with a high level of English  - Experience in telemarketing or as a sales account manager is an advantage but not a must  - Interested in a commercial career  - Good interpersonal and communication skills  - Motivated and Dynamic  - Professionalism and positivism    WHAT'S ON OFFER:  - Possibilities of training in England  - Specialized training program during the first month  - International environment    YOUR APPLICATION:   If interested please send us your CV in English refering to   "ZAV1-Spanien:Business Development Agents"   spascaline@talentsearchpeople.com  or call 0034 93 231 0000 (ask for Sylvia Pascaline) -  Geforderte Anlagen: Your CV in English, Salary expectations and availability

Die acs alpha-group ist ein europaweit agierender Engineering- und Personal-Dienstleistungspartner mit Sitz in Bayern und bundes-/europaweiten Niederlassungen und kontinuierlich auf der Suche nach qualifizierten, erfahrenen Köpfen und Talenten.    Unsere Fachbereiche sind neben Engineering, Tooling und Consulting sowohl die ganzheitliche und hochqualitative Personaldienstleistung für Hilfs-, Fach-, Führungskräfte sowie Freiberufler und Menschen die auf der Suche nach neuen Herausforderungen sind, inklusive der individuellen Kompetenz- und Potential-Analyse.    Für unseren renommierten, in Spanien (Valencia) und im Automotiveumfeld ansässigen Kunden suchen wir in Festanstellung    - PROJEKTEINKÄUFER AUTOMOTIVE INTERIEUR (RFQ) m/w  (Kunststoff / Türverkleidungen, Seiten- und Säulenverkleidungen, Hard & Soft-Trim, Mittelkonsole)    OEM: FORD    mit gelegentlicher Reisebereitschaft für Thailand    Sie passen am besten zu uns wenn Sie sich durch folgende Kompetenzen auszeichnen:    - Sie haben allgemeinen Automotive Engineering-Hintergrund mit Erfahrung in der Steuerung von Beschaffungsvorgängen    - gerne Kenntnisse in der Entwicklung von Interieur-Komponenten, bevorzugt Hard Trim (Kunststoff/Holzdekor, Säulen A/B/C, Türverkleidungen, Seitenverkleidungen)    - sprechen fließend Englisch, Spanisch vorteilhaft und verfügen über Kommunikations-und Präsentationstechniken    - Erfahrung im FORD-Umfeld ist von Vorteil    Wir freuen uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Bewerbung vorzugsweise per e-mail    pohl.m@acs-alpha-group.com    welche wir selbstverständlich vertraulich und diskret behandeln. - Geforderte Anlagen: vollständiger und aussagekräftig detailierter Lebenslauf, Zeugnisse; Führerscheine: Fahrerlaubnis B PKW/Kleinbusse (alt: FS 3): Wünschenswert; Kenntnisse und Fertigkeiten: Beschaffungslogistik; Terminplanung, -überwachung

Die acs alpha-group ist ein europaweit agierender Engineering- und Personal-Dienstleistungspartner mit Sitz in Bayern und bundes-/europaweiten Niederlassungen und kontinuierlich auf der Suche nach qualifizierten, erfahrenen Köpfen und Talenten.    Unsere Fachbereiche sind neben Engineering, Tooling und Consulting sowohl die ganzheitliche und hochqualitative Personaldienstleistung für Hilfs-, Fach-, Führungskräfte sowie Freiberufler und Menschen die auf der Suche nach neuen Herausforderungen sind, inklusive der individuellen Kompetenz- und Potential-Analyse.    Für unseren renommierten, in Spanien (Valencia) und im Automotiveumfeld ansässigen Kunden suchen wir eine/n    - SE-Sprecher/ PROJEKTLEITER  Entwicklung Door-Panels / Side Trims VW Golf    für die Entwicklung automotiver Interieur-Konzepte  (hier Tür- und Seitenverkleidungen)    Sie passen am besten zu uns wenn Sie sich durch folgende Kompetenzen auszeichnen:    - Sie verfügen über allgemeinen Automotive Engineering-Hintergrund  - haben Kenntnisse in der Entwicklung von Interieur-Komponenten, bevorzugt Hard Trim (Tür- und Seitenverkleidungen)  - haben Erfahrung mit Entwicklungstools wie FMEA (Konstruktion und/oder Prozess), GD & T sowie Design/Montage und diversen VW-Programmen  - haben erweiterte Kenntnisse in thermoplastischen Prozessen/Produktionstechnologien und Materialien  - agieren als Engineering-Support für die Ansprechpartner des Kundenteams, unterstützen den Kunden bei Design-Besprechungen, bei der Serieneinführung sowie ggf. in den Produktionswerken/Forschung & Entwicklung  - Sie sind in der Lage, Vorschläge und Angebote zu erstellen und diese entsprechend zu interpretieren  - treffen Korrekturmaßnahmen falls diese nach Design-Abnahme testisch nötig werden  - führen ein Entwicklungs- und Designteam (direkt beim Kunden vor Ort sowie europaweit/außerhalb, falls erforderlich)  - sprechen fließend Englisch und Deutsch und verfügen über überzeugende Kommunikations-und Präsentationstechniken    - Erfahrungen im VW-Umfeld (Programme und Systeme) sind von Vorteil, sowie FUNDIERTE Anwendungserfahrung mit CATIA V5 (KUNSTSTOFF)    Wir freuen uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Bewerbung vorzugsweise per e-mail    pohl.m@acs-alpha-group.com    welche wir selbstverständlich vertraulich und diskret behandeln. - Geforderte Anlagen: vollständiger und aussagekräftig detailierter Lebenslauf, Zeugnisse; Führerscheine: Fahrerlaubnis B PKW/Kleinbusse (alt: FS 3): Wünschenswert; Kenntnisse und Fertigkeiten: Projektmanagement; Präsentation

SEM Specialist for Germany, Austria & Switzerland (Paid and Organic search, Social media).
PROFILE OF EMPLOYEE:
 Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly target levels for number of customers, overall bookings, marketing spend & contribution margin.
 Effectively coordinate with other team members to manage the acquisition spend budget to maximize  efficiency.
 Analyze mid and long term campaign development and identify past drivers and new opportunities for further growth.
 Coordinate the strategy, creative, messaging and deployment of search listing copy, media and offer mix by keyword.
 Execute and measure Search marketing strategy at the keyword level.
 Play a key role in the cross-functional team effort to optimize the Vistaprint site for Natural organic search listings.
 Utilize  internal and  external resources  to manage spend and campaigns.
 Manage relationship with external search partners and internal Vistaprint team-members to ensure that the Search channels performance is optimized.
SKILLS:
 University degree in Business or Marketing.
 In-depth knowledge and understanding of DACH Search Market.
 Strong analytical and organizational skills.
 Self-motivated and able to work independently.
 Proactive and with a can do attitude.
 Planned and disciplined, detail-oriented and precise.

The Centre for Ecological Research and Forestry Applications (CREAF) is a public research institution that was created in 1987 by the Generalitat (Autonomous Government) of Catalonia, the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB) and the Institute of Catalan Studies (IEC), to promote basic and applied research in terrestrial ecology. The University of Barcelona (UB) subsequently joined in. CREAF seeks a professional in the field of management research projects, especially Europeans. Main functions of the job:
- Promote the participation of researchers in new research projects (search for new funding opportunities)
- Participation in the request of proposals for new projects
- Control and monitoring of the different projects of the center
- Administrative support and management, participating in the supervision of different projects
- Participation in the preparation of justification reports
- Participation and support in the preparation of audits. 
PROFIL OF EMPLOYEE:Degree in Business Administration, Economics or similar. Or alternatively, a Degree in Biology, Environmental Science, Forest Engineering or similar, with possession of Master`s Degree in Administrative Management. Minimum one year experience in tasks related to project management, having knowledge of the different research programs: FP7, INTERREG, EUROSTARS, LIFE,  Required proof of English level (certificate)
High level of Spanish and Catalan.
We assessed the knowledge of other EU languages.

As a Consultant, you will work in a project team and support our clients in solving a technology challenge. 

Depending on academic background and practical experience your assignment will involve a variety of project stages: technical/strategic studies, research and development and/or implementation. 
 
During your assignment, you can work in a number of different projects and gather valuable experience in an international context.

 - Your profile

MSc, Diploma (or equivalent) in engineering, specializing in computer science/computer engineering, electrical engineering, automation technology or telecommunications engineering, mechanical engineering or automotive engineering and have initial professional experience in technical projects in the automotive, aerospace or aeronautics industry. In addition, you are familiar with one or more of the following areas:

-development of microcontroller- or DSP-based cross-linked embedded systems (software)
-analysis of requirements and standards
-bus systems (e.g. CAN, LIN, MOST, FlexRay)
-development processes (V-model, SPICE, CMMI)
-programming languages: C/C++, assembler
-compilers & linkers
-operating systems: osek, nucleus (or similar)
-version control: synergy, clearcase, cvs (or similar)

* Mobility:
100 km away from Barcelona

Studies: Upper Electronics, telecommunication or Systems Engineering.
Experience: More than 1 year.
Personal capabilities : Good communication skills and team work.

Requirement: 

- To apply please send us your candidature to andrea.aponte@altran.es
- Notice that to participate in our job offer you must have experience among automotive or railway sector before. 

- On the text of your CV it is compulsory to answer the next questions:

1. Why do you think your profile is appropriate for this job offer?.
2. Describe the main project you have done which has given you enough experience to participate in this job offer and also which technological tools you have used.

Able to create trust with the client and within the organisation. Able to work and to take decisions autonomously. Culturally sensitive, willing to travel (50% of the time) Used to work independently with a little supervision. Preferably with 3 years or more experience in commercial function.

column4: Wir gehören der ALDI-Nord Gruppe an mit unserem nationalen Firmensitz der spanischen Gesellschaft in Barcelona. Unsere Gesellschaft hat ihren Sitz in Sevilla.    Wir suchen:  Junge Hochschulabsolventen mit Führungsqualitäten (abgeschlossenes Studium), wünschenswert aus dem Bereich Wirtschaft, persönliches Engagement, Arbeits- und Anpassungsfähigkeit, Deutsch- und Spanischkenntnisse sowie uneingeschränkte Mobilität innerhalb unseres Tätigkeitsgebietes im Süden Spaniens.     Aufgabengebiet:  Führungsübernahme einer unserer Regionen, in die das Verkaufsstellennetz von ALDI Supermercados im Süden Spaniens unterteilt ist.    Voraussetzungen:  Geografische Mobilität, enge Verbindung zu Andalusien, Teamgeist, Eigeninitiative, hohe Motivation, hohe Entscheidungsfähigkeit, effizientes Arbeiten, Berufserfahrung in den bereichen Verkauf und Mitarbeiterführung, Deutsch- und Spanischkenntnisse.  Für uns ist die persönliche Bindung des Bewerbers an Andalusien / Extremadura besonders wichtig.    Geboten wird ein unbefristeter Arbeitsvertrag.  Gehalt: 36.000€ Brutto/Jahr. Candidates must be very interested in technology and with a clear commitment to perfection. Different teams with profiles 2-7 years of experience in the automotive sector. We might also accept less experienced engineers, but with a brilliant academic record. We bet on engineers whose personal competences and continued interest in learning take precedence over experience. Profiles focused on hardware and software development) within the automotive sector. PROFILE: Electronic Engineering or similar. 
Minimum 2 years experience in developing electronic projects in the automotive sector. Experience in power electronics. Collaborations on electric or hybrid vehicles projects will be valued.Fluent in English. Availability to reside in Catalonia. Experience in:
 Developing embedded software with C language and C + +, preferably in the automotive sector
KNOWLEDGE:
 Microcontrollers 16 to 32 bits
 Subversion
 CAN communication buses, LIN
 Matlab / Simulink
 Desired requirements: Experience in defining test protocols based on specifications. Relocation pack negotiable. Long term contracts.

Proactively complete assigned tasks accurately and thoroughly, and within a specified timeframe in order to detect (and subsequently report on a daily basis) localisation bugs, software flaws and/ or design issues. 
 Ensure that no guideline-related bug, flaw or issue remains in the signed-off product and report them as early as possible. 
 Proactively seek to improve knowledge of testing procedures and where applicable related equipment 
 Ensure correct write-up (in English) of bugs, flaws and issues, and propose corrections to facilitate fixes 
 Inform Supervisors of any issue that may slow down, stop - or improve - testing progress as early as possible 
 Maintain strong teamwork within the team 
 Adhere to EA security procedures; take responsibility for equipment and software security; each individual is responsible for the security of any hardware or software that is in their possession. 
 Communicate pertinent information to other team members. 
 Work to achieve group targets as published in the Key Performance Indicators. 
 Perform other tasks when requested by the management 

Special Considerations 

 EAs European Shared Service Centre for Testing & Certification is a dynamic area where there are peak periods of activity (May to December) and therefore the work load and the make-up of teams will vary. 

 Although candidates will be required to work a 40-hour week, they must be flexible in terms of actual working hours and be available for weekend work as and when necessary.

Cosentino S.A., grupo empresarial Español, está buscando un Consultor Interno de Procesos para definir, planificar, ejecutar y controlar proyectos de reingeniería de procesos para simplificación de todos los procesos llevados a cabo en la compañia.
Imprescindible:
Ingeniería Superiór o LADE, Paquete Office, incluyendo Project y Visio. Conocimiento SAP y metodología PMI. 3 años de experiencia en consultoría de Procesos o Auditoría y en implantación de proyectos de reingeniería de procesos. 

Cosentino S.A. is looking for a Internal Consulting Process to develope the definition, planning, execution and control of process reengineering projects for simplifying all processes carried out at the company.
Essential:
Engineering or Management and Administration, Office Package, including Project and Visio, SAP Knowledges and PMI methodology.
3 years of experience in process consulting or audit, also in implementation of process.
The firm facilitate accommodation the two first weeks.

Importante grupo español busca asesor jurídico internacional para asesorar a las filiales del grupo en diversas materias; patentes y marcas, seguimiento, asistencia, control de operaciones jurídicas y cuestiones mercantiles.
Imprescindible: Licenciado/a en Derecho, con mas de 5 años de experiencia en despachos internacionales o en Departamentos Jurídicos de Emplesas Multinacionales. Nivel Alto de Ingles y Español. Conocimientos de herramientas de Ofimática. Valorable: Master en asesoría jurídica.
An Important Spanish group is looking for a International Legal Consultant to carry out the following functions:
Advice on comercial matters to the business group.
Monitoring, control assistance and legal operations in international subsidiary centers.
Legal Advice on patents and trademarks.
Essential: Degree in Law and more than 5 years of experience at international law firm or legal department in a multinational company. Good knowledge of English and Spanish and regular user-office tools. Master in legal consultancy could be valuable.
The firm facilitate accommodation the two first weeks.

English Summer Camp in Galicia, north-west of Spain, is looking for staff: English native speakers, with training and/or experience in working with children and teenagers. Some candidates must have training and experience teaching English as a second language. Some manager positions are also available for those with training and experience as Camp Director and Camp Director Assistant. All candidates will be responsible for looking after children at the camp.
Summer camps will last 6 weeks, beginning in late June and ending in August, exact dates will be given to succesful candidates.
Company offers free accomodation and food , Santiago's airport transfer to the camp the first and the last working days, training, and a Spanish labour contract. Minimum salary for the 6 weeks period will be 1.200 euros gross for the less qualified positions.
Candidates have to send a full CV to employer's mail and be prepared to give refrences and/or a CRB

The employees have to manage and resolve computer issues to customers located abroad. Management should be held in the customer´s language. The incidence management service will be 24x7, with shifts morning, afternoon and night. Expert knowledge in Windows Operating System, LAN, WAN networks, remote monitoring tools and technical problems management tools. The have to be fluent in any of the following languages:English, german, french, italian, dutch, russian, swedish or portuguese.

La tarea consiste en gestionar y resolver incidencias informáticas de manera remota a clientes situados en el extranjero. Dicha gestión debe realizarse en el idioma del cliente, por tanto, los candidatos deben tener un nivel alto hablado en alguno de los siguientes idiomas:Inglés, alemán, francés. italiano, holandés, ruso, sueco, portugués.
 Asimismo han de tener experiencia de al menos 1 año en los sistemas operativos Windows (NT, 2000, XP y Vista), Microsoft Office, redes (configuraciones de equipos y periféricos) y mantenimiento de hardware. Se valorarán además, conocimientos en sistemas operativos Linux y Unix, y herramientas de control remoto en atención a usuarios (VNC, Dameware, Escritorio remoto de Windows). Conocimientos sobre la gestión de incidencias, configuración y errores

Cosentio, líder mundial en la fabricación de superficies de cuarzo Silestone busca dos CONSULTORES SAP para analizar y proponer mejoras en los procesos, aportar soluciones a los procesos de negocio de la compañía; identificar y explotar oportunidades de mejora en todas las áreas de la compañía, garantizando la correcta implantación de los sistemas de información y su empleo óptimo.
FUNCIONES: Interlocución con usuarios del módulo SAP MM/SD/CRM; Definición y parametrización de roles de autorización; Formación de usuarios; Parametrización o mantenimiento al módulo; Evaluación, diseño e implantación de escenarios para las incidencias recurrentes.
REQUISITOS: INgeniería o LADE; Nivel de inglés muy alto; Conocimientos MM y SD (se valorarán conocimientos de CRM y SRM). Experiencia profesional previa de entre 3 y 5 años en un puesto similar. Disponibilidad para viajar. Uno de los puestos de trabajo es para trabajar en Houston (USA).

Cosentino, first world producer of Silestone ® quartz surfaces, is a family-owned and wholly Spanish group. 
Cosentino focuses on the design, production and distribution of surfaces for kitchens and bathrooms from innovative solutions that provide design, brand value to inspire the lives of their clients.
The group bases its development on international expansion and an innovative research program, which applies the most advanced technology for obtaining new materials.
Cosentino Group is looking for a SAP Consultant.
Mission: Analysis and improvement of the process, finding solutions to the business process of the company, identifying and using opportunities to improve all company fields. To guarantee the correct implementation of IT solutions and their best possible use.

Computer Sciences España S.A. (CSC)needs for it`s seat in Avilés an AS400 OPERATOR. The recruited person will be in charge of the following main tasks:
- Check AS400 alerts
- Check Batch processes, restart processes KO
- Follow-up of AS400 incident and follow correctly the escalation process
- Resolve incidents within the existing SLA`s
People will have to work in shifts. Experience doing similar tasks
Knowledge of AS400 commands (Spool, Writers, Devices, Jobs, File, etc..)
Knowledge of logical commands: Scheduler open, schedule alerts, open focal
Backup management: BRMS
Knowledge of AS400 architecture
Fluent in French and English. Six months of experience is required. Salary depends on experience and qualifications.
Interested candidates please send CV to csc-spain@csc.com.

Empresa española constructora de obra civil con sólida estructura desea cubrir puesto en Rumanía (Cluj-Napoca). Incorporación inmediata. Elevada capacidad de negociación y habilidad para las relaciones públicas. Se valorará haber trabajado con empresas españolas. Imprescindible dominio de los idiomas español y rumano, valoración del idioma inglés. Contrato incial 1 año, prorrogable. Enviar CV con foto y carta de presentación en español: mgomez@ideconsa.com.

We are looking for candidates in the field of technology and R&D consulting at Altran in Barcelona & Madrid (Spain).
- Your roles and responsibilities:

As a Consultant, you will work in a project team and support our clients in solving a technology challenge. 

Depending on your academic background and practical experience your assignment will involve a variety of project stages: technical/strategic studies, research and development and/or implementation. 
 
During your assignment, you will have the opportunity to work in a number of different projects and will be able to gather valuable experience in an international context.

 - Your profile

1. Upper degree on Electronics, telecommunication or Systems Engineering. 

2. Previous experience (more than 1 year) working on Reliability, Availability, Maintainability and Safety among automotive or Railway sector in Software matters. 

3. Experience with ISO 26262 and IEC 61508 studies and rules. 

4. Good communication skills. 
Studies: Upper Electronics, telecommunication or Systems Engineering.
Experience: More than 1 year.
Personal capabilities : Good communication skills and team work

Requirement: 

- To apply please send us your candidature to andrea.aponte@altran.es 

- Notice that to participate in our job offer you must have experience among automotive or railway sector before. 

- On the text of your CV it is compulsory to answer the next questions:

1. Why do you thing your profile is appropriate for this job offer?.
2. Describe the main project you have done which has given you  enough experience to participate in this job offer and put inside which technological tools you have used.

 
SPANISH & FRENCH APPRECIATED

Cosentino, first world producer of Silestone ® quartz surfaces, is a family-owned and wholly Spanish group. 
Cosentino focuses on the design, production and distribution of surfaces for kitchens and bathrooms from innovative solutions that provide design, brand value to inspire the lives of their clients.
The group bases its development on international expansion and an innovative research program, which applies the most advanced technology for obtaining new materials.
COSENTINO Group is looking for an assistant engineer for customers.
Functions: To provide Technical Training for Silestone clients as how to elaborate and maintain the quality, appearance etc. of Silestone, with focus on international clients (80% of working time)
To increase the sale of complementary products
To identify and report any problems regarding quality
Participate in training classes and accompany managers/sales stuff when visiting clients when required.

Profile: Ideal candidates should have a Degree in Engineering or similar Technical training, 
Experience in the elaboration of Silestone is an plus.
An in-depth technical knowledge of machinery, the product and its elaboration.
A VERY HIGH LEVEL OF ENGLISH is a must. Other languages (German,French or Italian) are a plus.
NB. This position requires travelling more than 80% of the time.

As a Knowledge Engineer you will work with a combination of linguistic and technical tools, for coding, testing and improving the knowledge base of our product suite, through tools that use natural language processing. Knowledge Engineers are part of the Operations department, in the Barcelona office.
The position will focus upon:
Working with the grammar of native language (syntax and semantic aspects) to structure and code the knowledge base of our VCAs (Virtual Chat Agents) and other natural language products.
Implementing logic within knowledge, applying linguistic and technical tools. 
Optimizing and improving the dialogue flow of the VCAs or any other solutions.
Carrying out Quality Assurance actions within the knowledge bases.
Collaborating in internal projects to improve Production Office methodologies and processes.
Take part in presales actions and mainly in productions within project deliveries, having some client contact, following production methodologies, working in teams.
PROFIL OF EMPLOYEE:
We need you to be/have:
Native speaker of Norwegian (this is an indispensable requirement).
Good command of English.
Degree in Dialog Systems, Science, Linguistics, Linguistics Engineering, Translation, IT, Business or Communication.
Previous work experience in translation, localization, or any other linguistic related work is highly advisable.
Creative language/writing and logical skills.
Some IT/Developer experience and interest.
Residence in Spain.
Eager to learn and develop, passionate about languages, curious about technology and the Internet, professionally responsible and committed. NORWEGIAN (NATIVE SPEAKER)+ENGLISH (FLUENT). Contract: Temporary 6 months+6months+permanent. More info: www.artificial-solutions.com

We are looking for candidates in the field of technology and R&D consulting at Altran in Barcelona (Spain). 
- Your roles and responsibilities

As a Consultant, you will work in a project team and support our clients in solving a technology challenge. 

Depending on your academic background and practical experience your assignment will involve a variety of project stages: technical/strategic studies, research and development and/or implementation. 
 
During your assignment, you will have the opportunity to work in a number of different projects and will be able to gather valuable experience in an international context.

 - Your profile

-	Upper degree on Industrial and/or Mechanical Engineering. 
-	Previous experience (more than 1 year) working on diesel system motor calibration among automotive sector. 
-	Familiar with INCA, Matlab and simulink software



Studies: Upper Industrial and/or Mechanical Engineering.
Experience: More than 1 year.
Personal capabilities : Good communication skills and team work


Requirement: 

- To apply please send us your candidature to andrea.aponte@altran.es 

- Notice that to participate in our job offer you must have experience among automotive sector before. 

- On the text of your CV it is compulsory to answer the next questions:

1. Why do you think your profile is appropriate for this job offer?.
2. Describe the main project you have done which has given you  enough experience to participate in this job offer and put inside which technological tools you have used.

column4: An der Abteilung Madrid des Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts (DAI) ist voraussichtlich zum  1. September 2011 die Stelle eines     wissenschaftlichen Referenten/einer wissenschaftlichen Referentin     zu besetzen. Die Stelle ist auf fünf Jahre befristet. Entgelt wird nach Entgeltgruppe 13 TVöD gezahlt.  Daneben werden Auslandsbezüge für den Dienstort Madrid gewährt. Es wird eine für beide  Seiten verbindliche Probezeit von sechs Monaten vereinbart.    Zu den Aufgaben gehören die Durchführung selbständiger Forschungen und die Leitung der  wissenschaftlichen Bibliothek der Abteilung.    Anforderungen  Voraussetzung für die Bewerbung ist   -   die Promotion im Fach Klassische Archäologie oder Provinzialrömische Archäologie.  -  Von den Bewerbern und Bewerberinnen werden praktische Erfahrungen in der archäologischen Feldarbeit erwartet.  -   Gute Kenntnisse der Archäologie des Arbeitsgebietes der Abteilung sind erwünscht.  -   Kenntnisse der spanischen Sprache und  -   gute Anwenderkenntnisse in der Informationstechnik sind von Vorteil.  -   Die Bereitschaft zur Teilnahme an den vielfältigen Projekten der Abteilung wird vorausgesetzt.    Bei gleicher Eignung, Befähigung und fachlicher Leistung werden Frauen nach Maßgabe des  Bundesgleichstellungsgesetzes, Schwerbehinderte nach dem SGB IX bevorzugt berücksichtigt.    Bewerbungen mit Lebenslauf, Zeugnissen, Schriftenverzeichnis und Angaben über bisherige  berufliche Tätigkeiten und über eigene begonnene oder in Aussicht genommene  Forschungsprojekte werden bis zum  31. Mai 2011 an folgende Anschrift erbeten:  Deutsches Archäologisches Institut  Abteilung Madrid  Kennziffer: 17/2011  Serrano 159  E - 28002 Madrid  Der auf der Homepage des DAI www.dainst.de (Infos/Stellenangebote) eingestellte  Bewerbungsbogen sowie die Erklärung zu den Promotionszeiten sind den  Bewerbungsunterlagen ausgefüllt beizufügen. Von der Übersendung elektronischer  Bewerbungen bitten wir abzusehen.    Aus Kostengründen können Bewerbungsunterlagen nur dann zurückgesandt werden, wenn ein  ausreichend frankierter Rückumschlag beigefügt ist. Andernfalls werden die Unterlagen nach  Abschluss des Bewerbungsverfahrens vernichtet. -  Geforderte Anlagen: siehe Stellenbeschreibung, keine e-mails; Kenntnisse und Fertigkeiten: Archäologie; Ausgrabungen

column4: ALPHA CRC (gegr. 1987) mit Hauptsitz in Cambridge (UK) ist weltweit eines der führenden Lokalisierungsunternehmen. Wir beschäftigen in unseren Büros in Cambridge, Barcelona, Montpellier, Bologna, Brno usw. um die 160 feste Mitarbeiter, im Wesentlichen Übersetzer, aber auch Projektleiter, QA-Mitarbeiter, Programmierer usw. und sind derzeit am Expandieren. Wir sind stolz auf die sprachliche und technische Qualität unserer Leistungen und freuen uns über Bewerbungen von motivierten potenziellen Mitarbeitern, die eine internationale Umgebung zu schätzen wissen und ihre sprachliche Kompetenz bei uns einbringen möchten.      Für unser im Aufbau begriffenes GAMES-Team in Barcelona suchen wir Übersetzer/innen, die als Team-Leads für groß angelegte Games-Übersetzungen fungieren können, also selbst mehrjährige Erfahrung im Übersetzen oder Verfassen von Games-Texten mitbringen, gewohnt sind, Glossare und Richtlinien zu verfassen und für die Einhaltung der Vorgaben zu sorgen sowie externen Übersetzern konstruktives Feedback zu geben.    Aufgabengebiet:  Übersetzen aller Art von Texten im Zusammenhang mit Games: In-Game-Texte: Beschreibungen der Welten, Rassen usw., Dialoge; Kreieren der Namen (Charaktere, Inventargegenstände, Schauplätze, Zauberformeln usw.); Verpackungs- und Werbetexte, Informationsmaterialien für die Gaming-Community usw.     Wir suchen:  Kompetente Übersetzer/Autoren mit überdurchschnittlichem Sprachgefühl, die selbst Games-Enthusiasten sind und sich in diesem Universum zuhause fühlen. Kreativität und Stilsicherheit wichtig!   Voraussetzungen: Deutsch, Englisch, evtl. Japanisch  Mind. 3 Jahre Berufserfahrung als Games-Übersetzer oder Autor erforderlich.      Wir bieten:  Industriekonformes Gehalt, Festanstellung, internationale Atmosphäre, moderne Ausstattung.  Gehalt: 23.000-28.000 € brutto/Jahr. Übernahme der Vorstellungskosten.  Probezeit 3 Monate, Kündigungsfrist 1 Monat.      ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Bitte Bewerbung inkl.Lebenslauf und Zeugnisse sowie Liste relevanter Tätigkeiten (Games-Projekte) in Deutsch, Englisch oder Französisch.

ALPHA CRC (gegr. 1987) mit Hauptsitz in Cambridge (UK) ist weltweit eines der führenden Lokalisierungsunternehmen. Wir beschäftigen in unseren Büros in Cambridge, Barcelona, Montpellier, Bologna, Brno usw. um die 160 feste Mitarbeiter, im Wesentlichen Übersetzer, aber auch Projektleiter, QA-Mitarbeiter, Programmierer usw. und sind derzeit am Expandieren. Wir sind stolz auf die sprachliche und technische Qualität unserer Leistungen und freuen uns über Bewerbungen von motivierten potenziellen Mitarbeitern, die eine internationale Umgebung zu schätzen wissen und ihre sprachliche Kompetenz bei uns einbringen möchten.    Wir suchen derzeit zur Ergänzung unseres deutschen Übersetzerteams in Barcelona Übersetzer/innen, die technische Texte (Software, Online-Hilfen, Benutzerdokumentation u.a.) aus dem Englischen in ihre Muttersprache, Deutsch, übertragen können. Gute IT-Kenntnisse und Erfahrung mit Lokalisierungsabläufen und Tools erforderlich. Des Weiteren sind wir auch dabei, ein spezialisiertes GAMES-Team aufzubauen.     Aufgabengebiet:  Übersetzen von Software und Texten technischer Art im Bereich Software-Lokalisierung, einschließlich Websites und Marketingmaterialien. Gelegentlich auch andere Texte (Pressemitteilungen, Produktbeschreibungen).    Wir suchen:  Kompetente Übersetzer/innen mit überdurchschnittlichem Sprachgefühl und effizienter Arbeitsweise, die ein professionelles, internationales Arbeitsklima zu schätzen wissen.  Voraussetzungen:   -Deutsch, Englisch, evtl. Französisch als 2. Fremdsprache.  -Windows, SDLX, Idiom u.a. Übersetzertools  -mind. 3 Jahre Berufserfahrung als technischer Übersetzer/in    Wir bieten:  Industriekonformes Gehalt, Festanstellung, internationale Atmosphäre, moderne Ausstattung.  Gehalt: 23.000-28.000 € brutto/Jahr. Übernahme der Vorstellungskosten.  Probezeit 3 Monate, Kündigungsfrist 1 Monat.      ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Bitte Bewerbung inkl.Lebenslauf und Zeugnisse in Deutsch, Englisch oder Französisch.

Der spanische Verein Ree Associacion sucht für die Betreuung von deutschen Jugendlichen in sozialpädagogischen Lebensgemeinschaften eine/n Dipl.Sozialpädagogen oder Erzieher (m/w) mit Berufserfahrung im Bereich stationäre Unterbringung.     Aufgabenbereiche: Rund-um-die-Uhr-Betreuung mit erlebnispädagogischen Arbeitsanteilen, ISE in Sozialpädagogischer Lebensgemeinschaft.    Es handelt sich um einen interessanten aber anstrengenden Arbeitsplatz mit Teamarbeit, Supervision, Gruppensupervision. Es besteht eine Infrastruktur für die Jugendlichen mit Schule, Praktika, Therapie usw..    Voraussetzung: teamorientiert, sportlich, gern mit handwerkl. Erfahrung, Sprachkenntnisse und EDV-Kenntnisse erwünscht.    Geboten wird ein unbefristeter, lokaler Arbeitsvertrag (3 Monate Probezeit, 2 Wochen Kündigungsfrist) mit einem Gehalt von 1300-1450 € Netto/Monat.  Übernahme der Reisekosten zur Arbeitsaufnahme in Höhe von 200 €.    Unterkunft wird gestellt (Miete 100-250 €/Monat).    Weitere Informationen zu Ree Associacion erhalten Sie unter www.ree-associacion.eu    ZAV1-Spanien -  Geforderte Anlagen: Bitte Bewerbung inkl. Lebenslauf und Zeugnisse in deutscher Sprache einreichen.

Wir suchen zum nächstmöglichen Eintrittstermin einen ausgebildeten und qualifizierten Koordinator für A/C im Endlinienprozesse (m/w) mit Berufserfahrung für den Einsatz in der Luftfahrt am Standort Sevilla.    Aufgaben:   Sie sind verantwortlich für den fristgerechten Folio Burndown eines oder mehrerer AC im Bereich Non-Elektrik, Aufplanung der Arbeitspakete im Bereich Non-Elektrik/Mechanik und Foliomanagement sowie Sicherstellung der Material- und Fertigungsdokumentenverfügbarkeit und deren Übergabe an die Fertigung, Prozessbezogenes   Arbeitsfortschrittsmonitoring, sowie Abstimmung themenspezifischer Ziele innerhalb des Bereiches Non-Elektrik/Mechanik nach Vorgabe durch den AC Manager zur Sicherstellung der fristgerechten Übergabe des AC an die FAL, Prüfen von Bauunterlagen und Fertigungsaufträgen, Beratung und Unterstützung von Konstruktion/MAP bei der   Erarbeitung von wirtschaftlich und technisch optimalen Lösungen, Focal Point im transnationalen Umfeld für Engineering, Produktion, Qualitätssicherung und Logistik für den Bereich Non-  Elektrik/Mechanik, Monitoren und Risikobewertung der Lieferperformance für den Bereich Non-Elektrik / Mechanik sowie Einleiten von Maßnahmen zur Beseitigung von Störungen die den Folioabbrand gefährden und/oder deren rechtzeitiges Eskalieren über den Aircraft Manager, Vorbereitung , Koordination und Moderation von Produktionsbesprechungen, Dokumentation des Abbrands in den vorgesehenen OSW Tools (CAIR Pflege) sowie Erstellen von Berichten und Statistiken für das AC Management und die Fertigung, Zuarbeit und Unterstützung des Berichtswesens/PMO.    Profil:   Sie haben ein bgeschlossenes Studium des Ingenieurwesens oder ein weiterführender Abschluss in einer anderen Fachrichtung mit langjähriger Planungserfahrung im Bereich Struktur/Mechanik, sehr gute Erfahrung in der Fertigungsvorbereitung, Fertigungssteuerung sowie Planungserfahrung, sicherer Umgang mit SAP, Excel, Primes und CAIR, Deutsch und Englisch   in Wort und Schrift ist zwingend notwendig auf Grund eines internationalen Projekts, Spanischkenntnisse von Vorteil, Sie sind teamorientiert, belastbar, besitzen eine hohe hohe Einsatzbereitschaft und Eigeninitiative sowie Durchsetzungsvermögen und Kommunikationsstark, Bereitschaft im Ausland zu arbeiten rundet Ihr Profil ab.    Perspektiven:   Unser Kunde bietet Ihnen leistungsgerechte Bezahlung und zeitgemäße Sozialleistungen sowie betriebliche Weiterbildung.    Wir freuen uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Online-Bewerbung (unter Angabe der Stellanangebots ID-Nr. 705), die Ihr persönliches Anschreiben, Ihren Lebenslauf sowie Ihre relevanten Zeugnisse enthält. Die heutige Grupo Condesa (Conducciones y Derivados S.A.) wurde im Jahr 1954 in Mondragón (Spanien) gegründet und hat sich von Anfang an auf die Fertigung von Stahlrohren konzentriert.     Gesucht wird ein/e Vertriebsmitarbeiter/in für Deutschland.    Aufgabengebiete:  Promote and manage sales of Zalain Transformados¿ products in Germany, especially for the automotive industry. Perform market research in order to identify and attract new customers.  - Direct sales of company products.  - Prepare financial proposals for customers.  - Maintain and retain customer base.  - Collaborate with the engineering department to develop products based on the  requirements and applications that have been identified.  - Conduct market research and gather information about competitors and other  information of interest.  - Assist customers with quality complaints; claims report, collect and send samples to  the factory.  - Daily relations with upper level management and Back office (Zalain Transformados) and existing customers   - Regularly relations with technical and quality department and with potential clients.    Voraussetzungen:  Master¿s or Associate¿s degree in Engineering, preferably Mechanical  - Responsible, independent and able to undertake new challenges.    - Availability to travel throughout Germany and occasionally to the factory (Spain).  - Business focus.    - Negotiation skills, outgoing personality. Strong interpersonal skills.  - Perfectionist with high level of efficiency  - User-level computer skills.    - Experience in the automotive industry will be positively considered.    Knowledge of languages: German and English mandatory and we value the knowledge of Spanish    Wir bieten:  - Salary will be in accordance with the candidate¿s background.  - Temporary contract with the possibility of evolving into a permanent contract  - Trial period: 6 months Terms of notice: 2 months    Other benefits:   - company car commission, movil phone and laptop  - Interview expenses paid by employer      Area of residence: Preferably in the Dortmund area.
